title: something unexpected happened while you trying to create your lobby
body: {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}  what happened to this shitty server? tried everything but still not working. no games can be played

replies.body:
Everything should be fixed now.

The cause was a backend update which caused lobby creation to break - meaning nobody could get in game.  We've rolled it back and it should all be smooth sailing now.  

Sorry for the interruption to your morning games.

Cheers
Mindstar
leagues down? well time to play fortnite xD

Hi folks

Somethings up - we're looking into it at the moment.  Will let you know more as soon as possible.

Cheers
Mindstar
